```{r}
library(tiotemp)
library(AirSensor)

setArchiveBaseUrl("http://data.mazamascience.com/PurpleAir/v1") # SCAQMD sensors
```

```{r}
s <- sensor_load()
data <- s$data
meta <- s$meta
```

```{r, fig.height=10}
timeseriesBarChart(meta, data)
```

```{r}
timeseriesMap1(data = data, meta = meta)
```

```{r}
pas <- pas_load()
pat <- pat_load(pas = pas, startdate = 20200101, enddate = 20200725, label = 'SCAH_27')
s1 <- pat_createAirSensor(pat, FUN = AirSensor::PurpleAirQC_hourly_AB_00)
s2 <- sensor_aggregate(s1)
```


```{r}
timeseriesCalendar(s2$data, s2$meta)
```
